removeCharacter: Are you sure you want to remove {{value}}? This will also remove all data such as loadouts and multi-opts, and remove this character from any teams this character is assigned to.

multiTarget.title: Multi-Optimization Target Config
multiTarget.info1: Note: Community-created Multi-Optimization Targets can be found within the <1>GO Discord</1> or <3>KQM's Multi-Optimization Guide</3>, however, the validity of such configurations cannot be guaranteed.
multiTarget.info2: It is the responsibility of the user to make sure configs accurately represent their use case.
multiTarget.jsonDescWarning: It seems like you're trying to import a multi-opt config. This isn't the right place for that! Please go back one modal and press Import Multi-Opt.

addStats.title: Bonus Stats
addStats.info: You can use these fields to add buffs/debuffs not directly supported in GO, such as food buffs, Abyss cards, or Superconduct. Please refer to the <1>Genshin Impact Wiki</1> for specific values.
addStats.label: New Bonus Stat

resetDialog.title: Reset TC build configuration?
resetDialog.content: This will clear the currently configured TC build you have.

copyDialog.title: Copy data from equipped artifacts and weapon?
copyDialog.content: This will clear the currently configured TC build you have, with data from the currently equipped build.

kqmsDialog.title: Use KQMS?
kqmsDialog.content: This will replace your current substat setup with one that adheres to the <5>KQM Standards.

gcsimDialog.title: gcsim Export
gcsimDialog.content: Import this build into <2>gcsim</2> by copying the code below.

tabTheorycraft.maxTotalRolls: The current build can only have a maximum of {{value}} rolls.
tabTheorycraft.maxRolls: This substat can have a maximum of 30 rolls.
tabTheorycraft.maxRollsMain: Because at least one main stat has the same attribute, this substat can have a maximum of {{value}} rolls.
tabTheorycraft.feasibilityAlert: The current substat distribution requires at least {{minSubLines}} lines of substats. Need to assign {{minOtherRolls}} rolls to other substats for this solution to be feasible.

optAlert.scalesWith: The selected Optimization target and constraints scales with:
optAlert.distribute: . The solver will only distribute stats to these substats.
optAlert.feasibilty: There may be additional leftover substats that should be distributed to non-scaling stats to ensure the solution is feasible.

tabTeambuff.resonance_tip: The party must be full with 4 characters in order for Elemental Resonance to take effect.

noLoadout: Looks like you haven't added any loadout/Teams with this character yet. You need to create a loadout+team with this character to create builds, theorycraft, or optimize.
